alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 10 at 3:12AM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible, with potentially up to 15 inches over the western Adirondacks. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The southern and western Adirondacks, the central and western Mohawk Valley and Schoharie County of eastern New York and the southern Greens Mountains of southern Vermont. * WHEN...Friday night through late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and potentially dangerous due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates may exceed one inch per hour during the day on Saturday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
